https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iR8bXeYPdaRABLKd87hDdT3pOSS.jpg The importance of the Atelier as a meeting and working-place for independent or beginning filmmakers is highlighted in Last days of Studio Frans van de Staak a necrology of his films by Kees Hin (2002), which focuses mainly on Van de Staak's non-naturalistic style of directing actors. De laatste dagen van het atelier Frans van de Staak
